mapper.select: SELECT p.pcode, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pdetail, p.precommanditem, b.bname, p.clarge, p.cmedium, p.csmall FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.pcode = #{pcode} AND p.bno = b.bno
SELECT scode, sproductcolor, sproductsize, sproductamount, pcode FROM stock WHERE scode = #{scode}

SELECT rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pdetail, precommanditem, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pdetail, precommanditem, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT p.pcode as pcode, p.pname as pname, p.pprice as pprice, p.pdetail as pdetail, p.precommanditem as precommanditem, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.clarge = #{category.cLarge} AND p.cmedium LIKE '%' AND p.csmall LIKE '%' AND b.bno = p.bno ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pager.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{pager.startRowNo}
SELECT pcode, cproductcolor, cimageproduct1, cimageproduct2, cimageproduct3, ccolorchipimage FROM color WHERE pcode = #{pcode}
SELECT pcode, sproductsize FROM productsize WHERE pcode = #{pcode}
SELECT COUNT(pcode) FROM product WHERE clarge = #{cLarge} AND cmedium LIKE '%' AND csmall LIKE '%'
